title: Green Dragonborn

Green Dragonborn

Spit Acid, Druid class.

Green Dragonborn is a Subrace of Dragonborn in Baldur's Gate 3. Green Dragonborn PRIMARYTRAIT. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their special characteristics and some of them have Sub-Races which provide different Features and Traits.
